citations.narrative:
The facility exhibits animals as part of their tour. The exhibiting of these animals is a regulated activity that requires
a class C license.
No covered activities may be conducted until an USDA license is obtained.
A pre license application package will be mailed to the facility.
An exit interview was conducted with APHIS personnel, Dr. Simone Tomlinson, VMO and a facility representative.
